attributes.title: The Mad Box is Coming + Blizzard Punishes 18k Accounts + Smash Was Amazon's Best Selling Game
attributes.description: CEO of Slightly Mad Studios has confirmed that they'll be making "the most powerful console ever", Blizzard is cracking down on Overwatch players having punished over 18k Korean accounts, Smash Bros Ultimate topped Amazon's best sellers chart for 2018, and more!

attributes.title: Erik Wolpaw Rejoins Valve + Ex-Hearthstone Staff Making Marvel Game + Free Games On Epic Games Store
attributes.description: Portal 2 writer Erik Wolpaw left Valve back in 2017 but seems to have returned, some ex-Hearthstone designers have joined forces to work on a brand new mobile Marvel game,  Super Meat Boy and What Remains of Edith Finch join the list of free games in the Epic Games Store, and more!

attributes.title: Next Xbox Will Have VR? + Stardew Valley Battle Royale Mod + Alien: Blackout is a Mobile Game
attributes.description: Analyst Lewis Ward says that Microsoft will continue to grab development studios and double down on VR in the future, Stardew Valley joins in on the battle royale genre with a new mod, Alien: Isolation's sequel "Blackout" is a mobile game, and more!

attributes.title: PS4 Sells Over 91 Million Units + Nintendo Joins the Humble Store + New Captain Marvel Trailer
attributes.description: Sony has announced that as of December 31st of 2018 the Playstation 4 family of consoles has sold over 91 million units, Nintendo has partnered up with the Humble Store but only for the US, Captain Marvel's new trailer shows off powers, personality, and skrulls, and more!

attributes.title: Fantastic Four coming to Spider-Man? + God of War Could Have Had DLC + Streamer BANNED for Drinking
attributes.description: Marvel Games has teased something Fantastic Four related is coming to Spider-Man on PS4, creative director of God of War, Cory Barlog, talked to Kinda Funny about the DLC that could have been, popular Twitch streamer and Cloud9 member Joseph Marquez aka Mango was temporarily banned on Twitch for “dangerous consumption of drugs or alcohol", and more!

attributes.title: Division 2 Not Coming to Steam + 30k PUBG Players Banned + Skyrim Composer Gives OK To Modders
attributes.description: Ubisoft announced that they will NOT sell The Division 2 on Steam opting for a release through the Epic Games Store and Uplay, the PUBG Esports Team dropped the ban hammer recently handing out 30,000 bans to cheaters in the game, Skyrim composer Jeremy Soule announced he will be letting indie and mod devs to freely use his new album in their projects, and more!

attributes.title: Bungie Splits From Activision + Rooster Teeth Announces Vicious Circle + Mortal Kombat 11 Cover
attributes.description: The honeymoon is officially over as Bungie and Activision split up, Rooster Teeth announced a brand new sci-fi multiplayer shooter titled Vicious Circle, Mortal Kombat 11's cover showcases the main man Scorpion, and more!

attributes.title: SNES Games Coming to Switch? + Celeste DLC Details + Fortnite Most Played Switch Game of 2018
attributes.description: Data mining has revealed that SNES games may be coming to Switch Online, we finally have details about Celeste's DLC, Fortnite beats Smash Bros as the most played Switch game of 2018, and more!

attributes.title: Rockstar Games SUED + Artifact Already Dead + Rocket League adds Crossplay to PS4!
attributes.description: The real life Pinkertons are coming after Rockstar for using their trademark without permission, Artifact's player-base has up and gone, PS4 players can finally join the Switch, Xbox One, and Steam folks in some Rocket League crossplay action, and more!

attributes.title: EA Cancels Open-World Star Wars Game +  Travis Strikes Again: Is It Good? + Smash Ultimate Sells 5 Million In First Week
attributes.description: EA originally shut down Visceral Games and moved Project Ragtag to EA Vancouver and now they've just cancelled it, Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes is coming out soon...but is it any good?, Nintendo's most recent entry in the Super Smash Bros. series hit 5 million units sold in its first week, and more!

attributes.title: EA Talks Future Star Wars Games + Bethesda Kills Westworld Mobile + PUBG & Fortnite Making Billions!
attributes.description: EA discusses just a bit of their future with the Star Wars franchise, Westworld Mobile is officially shut down due the Bethesda lawsuit, PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is making loads of money but Fortnite is still the champ, and more!

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat 11 Gameplay Revealed + Ace Combat 7 Reviews + Fortnite Big Competition for Netflix
attributes.description: Mortal Kombat 11 is gloriously gory, Ace Combat 7 reviews are flying in, Netflix talks getting rekt by Fortnite, and more.

attributes.title: Resident Evil 2 Reviews + H.Bomberguy Raises $340k for Trans Charity + Soulja Boy Is At It Again
attributes.description: Reviews are rolling in for the Resident Evil 2 Remake...but is it any good?, Youtuber and Twitch streamer H.Bomberguy raises $340k for the trans charity Mermaids while playing DK64, Soulja Boy refuses to give up the video game business and talks Fortnite, and more!

attributes.title: Switch BEST SELLER of 2018 + Life is Strange 2 Episode 2 Releases Soon! + Demon’s Souls Remaster?
attributes.description: Nintendo topped the charts with the Switch taking 2018's best selling console title, Life is Strange 2 Episode 2 is finally coming out, a potential Demon's Souls remaster may be in the works, and more!

attributes.title: Indie Dev DMCAs Its Own Game + Farming Simulator eSports!? + IGN Goofs on Resident Evil 2 Review
attributes.description: An indie dev had to DMCA its own game to regain control of it, we're getting a Farming Simulator eSports league, an IGN reviewer made some mistakes in their RE2 review, and more.

attributes.title: Metroid Prime 4 Moves To Retro Studios + Anthem Adding Social Hub + AI Beats Starcraft 2 Pros
attributes.description: Nintendo has announced that they scrapped their first attempt at Metroid Prime 4 and that Retro Studios will be taking over, after fan outcries Anthem will be adding a social hub for players, the robot overlords are on their way to world domination...starting with Starcraft 2, and more!

attributes.title: BioWare Apologizes for Anthem Demo + New Dragon Ball Game + A Cryptic Warning to KHIII Streamers?
attributes.description: BioWare is apologizing for the issues and errors during Anthem's VIP Demo weekend, there's a new Dragon Ball game coming, Square Enix has a cryptic warning for Kingdom Hearts III streamers, and more.

attributes.title: Valve Rips Epic over Metro Exodus + Nintendo Exec Joins Microsoft + Gamestop Fails to Sell Itself
attributes.description: The feud between Valve and Epic continues over Metro Exodus, Nintendo exec Damon Baker has jumped from the big N to the big X, Gamestop couldn't find a buyer for their company so they'll probably have to settle for trade-in credit, and more!

attributes.title: Piranha Plant Joins Smash! + Quantic Dream Is Now A Multiplatform Dev + Feb 2019 Games With Gold
attributes.description: The roster of Smash Ultimate just got bigger, developer Quantic Dream jumps from Sony exclusivity to multiplatform, Xbox has a list of great games for free if you're a Gold member in February, and more!

attributes.title: Fallout 76 Bobby Pin Bug Is BACK! + Nintendo Lowers Switch Sales Forecast + Dead or Alive 6 Goes F2P
attributes.description: If you thought the fallout Bethesda had was over...think again, despite having sold 32 million units Nintendo lowers the sales forecasts for the Switch, Dead or Alive 6 gets a free to play version, and more!

attributes.title: Nintendo Switch Mini Coming 2019? + PS4 Sales Top The Charts + Animal Crossing Switch RELEASE DATE?
attributes.description: Insiders tease info about a potential Switch Mini coming this year, Playstation 4 sales are topping the charts and it has made the all time best sellers list, Animal Crossing may be releasing sooner than expected, and more!

attributes.title: Metro Exodus Boycott? + Xbox Live Comes To Nintendo Switch + PS5 Could Be Backward Compatible
attributes.description: Metro Exodus developers warn that if PC players boycott the release future games won't come to PC at all, Microsoft announced that Xbox Live will be coming to Android, iOS, and the Nintendo Switch, Sony filed a patent that may indicate the PS5 will be completely backwards compatible, and more!

attributes.title: Respawn Launches Apex Legends + Wargroove Selling Well + Platinum Leaves Granblue Fantasy: Relink
attributes.description: Respawn took the gaming world by storm by mic dropping the release of their new Battle Royale game Apex Legends, indie tactics rpg Wargroove has already broken even and details plans for DLC, Platinum Games has pulled out from the mobile turned PS4 IP Granblue Fantasy, and more!

attributes.title: Disney Defends EA + Apex Legends Passes 2.5 Million Players + Death Stranding is "Crazy Complicated"
attributes.description: Disney admits they've never been great with video games while praising EA's handling of the Star Wars franchise, Respawn's new Battle Royal game is an absolute hit having passed 2.5 million players in 24 hours, Death Stranding star Norman Reedus says the game is "Completely Crazy", and more!

attributes.title: Metro Author Talks Backlash + Apex Legends Beats Fortnite on Twitch + Assassin's Creed 3 Remaster
attributes.description: The author of the Metro book series has addressed the situation surrounding Metro Exodus, Apex Legends passes Fortnite's numbers on Twitch three times over, Ubisoft finally talks about the Assassin's Creed 3 remaster, and more!

attributes.title: Axiom Verge Deletes STEAM + Apex Legends Hits 10 Mil Players + Activision Blizzard Drops In Value
attributes.description: The developer of Axiom Verge accidentally breaks the Epic Games Store version of the game by deleting STEAM, Apex Legends has officially passed 10 Million Players and listed details for future seasons and events, Activision Blizzard and multiple other large developers have just lost a ton of value, and more!

attributes.title: Apex Legends Saving EA + Division 2 Open Beta + Spyro Coming To Switch?
attributes.description: After taking huge hits in the stock market over the last few weeks EA has seen a rise since the release of Apex Legends, details about The Division 2's Open Beta have dropped, the Spyro Reignited Trilogy may be coming to Nintendo Switch, and more!

attributes.title: Apex Legends UNSTOPPABLE + Assassin’s Creed 3 On Switch? + Capcom Soundtracks On Spotify
attributes.description: Apex Legends hits 25 Million players and gives a noticeable boost to Titanfall 2's playerbase, Assassin's Creed 3 Remastered may actually be coming to Nintendo Switch, Capcom subtly drops a collection of mix-tapes on Spotify, and more!

attributes.title: Huge Activision Blizzard Layoffs + Sony Blocked Wargroove Crossplay + Metro Exodus...Is It Good?
attributes.description: After posting record profits Activision Blizzard did the most logical thing and cut 8% of it's total workforce totaling nearly 800 lost jobs, CEO of Chucklefish says Sony is the reason Wargroove doesn't have PS4 crossplay at launch, Metro Exodus reviews are in...but is it any good?, and more!

attributes.title: Kingdom Come Dev Acquired, Battlefield 5 Co-op is Here & More
attributes.description:
What a week! But a rebrand won't stop us from catching you up on the top headlines of the week.
